reviews.review_msg: I know the reviews on Dr.Bell are not the greatest but trust me when I say - TAKE A SEMINAR CLASS WITH DR. BELL. She is so intelligent, so respected and funny. She shows so many real life examples and gives you real knowledge of Forensics. Plus she brought us cake for our last class. She wants to see you succeed and cares about her students.

Lynne was great! Lectures were engaging, and the presentation was actually pretty fun since you picked your own topic! Not having the stress of a final, I feel like I actually learnt more info that will stick with me. She could seem patronizing if you asked too simple a question, but she's just got a different sense of humour you need to understand

Dr. Bell is definitely an anatomical specialist in her own right. I enjoyed very much in the way she delivers the course content. As a scientist herself, suprisingly, she seems to be quite spiritual. We simply need more scientist follow high moral codes like herself.

Dr. Bell is hilarious and an awesome prof! She's a fair marker, but don't expect to be babied through the course or to try and BS her or your presentation, because she isn't afraid to call you on it. This class is very unusual in nature since there are no exams; attendance not mandatory but go anyways!

Good class, ridiculously easy workload. Do not buy textbook, its like 250$ and not required. And if for some reason you need it for a reference or something its in the library. Other than that you won't crack it. Dr. Bell is a well spoken teacher and pretty easy marker.
